descriptionLong:
Kellogg's Sustain breakfast cereal is a combination of grain flakes, sultanas, apple and almonds. With 56% whole grains.

Kellogg's Sustain Original breakfast cereal with 56% whole grains is an energising combination of wheat, corn, rice and oat flakes, mixed with fruit and nuts including sultanas, currants and apple pieces with crunchy sliced almonds. It's a nutritious and delicious source of energy to start your day.

So whether it's at breakfast to help get you started in the morning or as a nutritious snack before training, Sustain provides you with energy (contains 630kJ per serve) to support you as part of a healthy varied diet.

Get active... and enjoy Sustain.

High in whole grain

Source of fibre

Good source of B vitamins and iron

No artificial colours or flavours

Suitable for vegans

attributes.ingredients: Whole grains (56%)(wheat, brown rice, rolled oats), corn, fruit (12%)(sultanas, apple preservative (223 sulphites), currants), sugar, almonds (2%), invert syrup, barley malt extract, salt, minerals (iron, zinc oxide), vitamins (niacin, vitamin B6, riboflavin, folate).
attributes.dietary: Contains: Sulphites, Gluten, Almond, Wheat. May contain: Tree Nuts, Peanuts
